about_the_game:
In China,we call guys who spend excessive money on video games “kelao”.Some early Chinese online games used to induce players to pay to crush non-paying users and monsters in the game. This game aims to restore the Chinese style of online games where players can recharge without spending real money, and let players experience the fun of "kelao"!(This is a single player game.)
If you are interested in our game, come and add to the wishlist of "Chinese Online Game"!

We are working on the English version and expect it to be available around the time of the official launch,so stay tuned please!Welcome “kelao” to our official discord！


Super Multiple Endings Multi-Week Program


There are about 10+ different endings for different experiences!
Do you want to recharge like crazy and become the lord of the Imperial City? Or do you want to develop steadily and get a beautiful woman? It's your choice!

Single-player gameplay simulates the fun of online gaming in a way you've never experienced before!


Experience Chinese online games with Sims gameplay!


The moment you enter the game, you are encouraged to drop everything and go to the online game to show off your skills, in order to one day be the lord of the Imperial City in the online game! However, at the same time when you are having a great time, you also fall into an endless abyss without realizing it...


pay to Win!

in the Game 99.99$ Charge At Will;

Charged to let you experience the thrill of a knife 999;
After charging, you can go to the field, go to the imperial city, go to the arena, hanging the white whoring "players" who do not charge money;
As long as you want, at any time you can rely on kryptonite on the peak of the game, to become a list of big brother, to experience the joy of the first leaderboard.

paid Experience, No One Else!

The game allows you to really experience the kelao world, the feeling that I am no one else.
In the field PK, you can pick a hundred people, experience kelao extreme PK feeling;
In the imperial city PK war, you can also be a person to attack or defend the city, a person to pick a city, and finally become the city master, look out of the world;
You must accept the worship of all gang members and look down on them as they look up to you;
At the same time, you can enjoy the worship of all the losers in the world chat!

highlighted.name: 独特属性 由你打造

detailed_description:
In China,we call guys who spend excessive money on video games “kelao”.Some early Chinese online games used to induce players to pay to crush non-paying users and monsters in the game. This game aims to restore the Chinese style of online games where players can recharge without spending real money, and let players experience the fun of "kelao"!(This is a single player game.)
If you are interested in our game, come and add to the wishlist of "Chinese Online Game"!

We are working on the English version and expect it to be available around the time of the official launch,so stay tuned please!Welcome “kelao” to our official discord！

name: Chinese Online Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10/11
  • Processor: intel I5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10/11
  • Processor: intel I5-8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The player will play the role of an older unmarried young man Lao Wang, because of the lack of money for marriage in thinking of ways to accidentally be attracted by the pop-up ads of an online game endorsed by a certain celebrity, and the gears of destiny began to turn at that moment.
